alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:51PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Box Butte, southern Dawes and east central Sioux Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 951 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hay Springs to near Flahertys Corner. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte, Box Butte Campground, Flahertys Corner, Box Butte Dam, Marsland and Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and until 1000 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
